head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PI, SUNYER, JAMES, M.D.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PI, SUNYER, JAMES, M.D.

block.p: PI-SUNYER-James, M.D., of NYC, formerly of Montclair, on May 12, 2000, husband of the late Mercedes, father of James A. Pi-Sunyer, F. Xavier Pi-Sunyer, M.D., Lina Grogan, Luis C. Pi-Sunyer, and the late Berta Williams, brother of Pere Pi-Sunyer. Also survived by 12 grandchildren and six great - grandchildren. Memorial Mass on Wednesday at 1 PM, at St. Cassian's Church, Upper Montclair. For information call Caggiano Memorial, Montclair, NJ.

SUNYER-James, M.D. The entire St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center family joins with the physicians and staff of the New York Obesity Research Center and the VanItallie Center for Nutrition & Weight Management in acknowledging with sadness the passing of James Pi-Sunyer, M.D., father of F. Xavier Pi-Sunyer, M.D., Chief of Endocrinology, Diabetes and Nutrition; Director, New York Obesity Research Center and Medical Director, VanItallie Center at St. Luke's-Roosevelt Hospital Center. To Dr. Pi-Sunyer and the entire PiSunyer family, we offer our heartfelt condolences. Sigurd H. Ackerman, M.D. President and CEO Wendy Z. Goldstein Executive VP and COO Cathy Nonas MS, RD, CDE Director, VanItallie Center John Thomas Barnard, M.D. President, Medical Board
